roleset.name: natural disaster: dust storm

example.name: haboob-n: arg2
example.text: A 57 mph haboob tore through the north side.

example.name: haboob-n: arg5
example.text: Large scale haboob with visibility under one-quarter mile traverses Midland metro region.

example.name: haboob-n: arg1
example.text: Essentially created a haboob of dust and city trash.

roleset.note: HABOOB-N NOTES: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to 'duststorm'. (from haboob.01-n)
The "VSP" function tags on 'death/injury toll' and 'damages/cost' correspond to the RED cause relation.
